review: Great for watching Amazon Prime, NetFlix, and Hulu Plus but lacks a lot of the additional channels/apps that a Roku has to offer. The Fire is much snappier than the Roku 3 that I had previously used and I love the picture quality of the streaming videos. Comparing it to streaming on a smart tv or bluray would be like comparing a horse and buggy to a Cadilac. I have not tried the games but they seem like a nice addition to a pretty capable device. If you just want NetFlix, Amazon Prime, and Hulu Plus videos this is an excellent device that will last for years. If you are looking to stream everything the internet has to offer you may want to wait for the Fire to catch up to its competitors in app offerings or go with a device that doesn't perform as well in the short term.
